price: ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߟߐߡߌ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߦߟߍ߬ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߟߏ߲߫ ߘߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߎ߲߬ߕߊ߮ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲߬ ߥߊ߯ߓߌߟߏ߯ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: taʿruju al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miq'dāruhu khamsīna alfa sanatin
